main event: A civilian observed a bright round object in the sky for 10-15 minutes on 12 August 1966.
interesting points: The object was approximately the size of a softball and glowed brightly,The object moved in an erratic pattern and appeared to sway,The observer noted the object was visible in broad daylight,The sighting was made by a sober and reliable civilian worker,No photographs were taken or found in the report.
